$description:
| What does this do? | Enable Conditional Access policies to block legacy authentication |
| Why should you use this? | Blocks legacy authentication protocols that do not support multi-factor authentication. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will be prevented from connecting with older versions of Office, ActiveSync or using protocols like IMAP, POP or SMTP. |
| Learn more | [Block legacy authentication](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/conditional-access/policy-block-legacy-authentication) |
